item.title: Release Notes

item.description: Release Notes Table of contents General New Features Bugfixes Improvements Adjustments Documentation Future Improvements Known Issues Urban Performance New Features Bugfixes Improvements Adjustments Documentation Future Improvements Known Issues Urban Hotspots New Features Bugfixes Improvements Adjustments Documentation Future Improvements Known Issues General New Features Roles were implemented to only allow certain users to make use of the UPT (UrbanPerformance and UrbanHotspots).
